description:
Foot bondage lovers get your fix. Samantha Sin's feet are bound tight with black hemp rope, knotted underneath the tender soles to make standing or putting any weight on them very unbearable. As she tries, unsuccessfully to find a comfortable way to position her feet, cyd begins to drip hot wax all over them, making her hop fast to avoid the searing sting of the wax, only to land on the knots that dig in again and again. Of course, there's a nasty hairbrush foot bastinado session to get the wax off because...well because can you think of a better way to do it?
Tiny Hot Blonde Chick lovers rejoice! Sarah Jane Ceylon is featured as well, her long sexy legs spread wide and bound to a metal device that holds them open as it holds her torso upside down. The position she is in is so intense it's almost unbelievable and get this - she designed the device herself to push her limits for you to enjoy. This shoot is all sorts of tight gags, hot feet, wax, drool, bondage and blondes and it was live! (Weren't you there?!) Awesome!
title: Hot Feet / Blonde Bondage (Live)
